query: Could you create a 5-day travel itinerary for 2 people starting in Syracuse and visiting 2 cities in Pennsylvania from March 1st to March 5th, 2022? We prefer private rooms as our accommodations and we will be bringing our pets along, so it is vital that our stays are pet-friendly, and we'd prefer not to travel by flight. Our budget is set at $2,900.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[State College,Harrisburg]
